title: Adhesive labels | Fastik
text: Adhesive Labels How demanding are your label and packaging needs? At Fastik, we use leading-edge flexographic printing/converting and digital equipment to create labels from blanks to 8 colors, including 4 color process. Even your most sophisticated label demands can be met on a variety of substrates. We utilize the most advanced color measurement devices available to ensure run to run consistency. Your labels will be custom made to meet your visual and functional specifications. - Printing up to 8 colors - Hi-Def Plates - Varnish/Lamination - Variety of Adhesives and substrates - Labels in rolls, sheeted, and fan-folded - Flexible lead-times
